item.title: How do i make my npc trade? need urgent help
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Add in first click NPC,(I forgot case ##) Or case 17 which is second click npc, meaning right click trade.

item.title: How do i make my npc trade? need urgent help
item.dc:creator: @Songoty Songoty
item.description:
@Songoty wrote:

devildude, you need to find the thing in client.java, not in npchandler, search
one click or two click, and find a npc thing you dont have, and add it there.

item.title: How do i make my npc trade? need urgent help
item.dc:creator: @devildude797 devildude797
item.description:
@devildude797 wrote:

this is in npc handler:

} if (npcs[i].npcType == 1598) { // skilling shop if (misc.random2(30) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "skilling shop!"; }
this is in shops.cfg i just added 4151 (whip) for a test.

shop = 42	skilling shop					2	2	4151	1

when i talk\trade to chaelder, she does nothing, so what do i do?

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make my npc trade? need urgent help

item.description:
@devildude797 wrote:

i have got this in NPCHandler:

} if (npcs[i].npcType == 2824) { // Crafting shop if (misc.random2(30) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Crafting shop!"; }

and NPCid 2824 (ellis) in auto spawn, but how do i make him trade?
Please help
